trans:
Gofen falls silent and doesn't respond to her lost in his thoughts about what he saw
Neslihan: Hey... Iâ€™m talking to you... look at me
Gofen turns and says: Huh... what did you say
Gofen laughs at her appearance and says: What is this? Hahaha, you made me laugh
Neslihan hits Gofen on the shoulder and says: Donâ€™t laugh... How do I look
He looks at her from top to bottom and says: Without it, you look much better (naughty, he means before she put it on ğŸ˜‚)
Neslihan is surprised but quickly understands, sits beside him, and doesn't look at her reflection in the room's mirror
She hits him hard on the chest and says: Were you looking at me from here, you perverted eye? Honestly, thatâ€™s shameful... Really, shame on you
Gofen: who? me? I didnâ€™t look... What are you saying ... No, no, I swear I didnâ€™t
Neslihan: Liar... This is why you were lost in thought while I was talking to you
Gofen scratches the back of his neck, lowers his head to the ground, and says: I didnâ€™t expect the four to do this!
Neslihan pushes him again and says: Shut up... Shut up... Ugh, Iâ€™m so embarrassed
Neslihan covers her face with her hand and says: Go on, leave
Gofen: Are you serious? You want me to leave you here and go?????!
Neslihan: Yes, go back to your house... This has become my home, if you havenâ€™t forgotten
